snippet: Dan Pfeiffer, President Obama’s 37-year-old chief strategist and one of his longest-serving advisers, was hospitalized twice last week after suffering “stroke-like symptoms,” White House officials confirmed on Friday.
abstract: Dan Pfeiffer, President Obama’s 37-year-old chief strategist and one of his longest-serving advisers, was hospitalized twice last week after suffering “stroke-like symptoms,” White House officials confirmed on Friday.

headline.main: Obama Aide Hospitalized Twice Last Week
